title: Giro d’Italia S2: Annemiek van Vleuten back in pink with 100th career win
content:
Defending champion extracts 45 seconds on direct rivals a day after the opening stage was canceled due to horrendous weather.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia S2: Annemiek van Vleuten back in pink with 100th career win on Velo.
author: ahood
